backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, chat history, and system events with access control checks for user and admin operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two documentation and validation improvements with related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend source files and deployment assets.
frontend/deploy/custom-domain.json: JSON config specifying the deployment slug "ai-master".
frontend/deploy/validate-custom-domain-s: Node script validating the custom domain slug against length and character rules and exiting with errors when invalid.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining design tokens, color variables, and light/dark theme values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation covering custom domain slug rules, current slug, and validation guidance.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, routing, theme provider setup, and profile setup modal logic.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with cache clearing and error recovery for duplicate authentication.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial user profile setup with username, consent checkbox, and save submission handling.
frontend/src/components/Chat/ChatCompose: Message composer with text input, voice input integration, and send handling via form or Enter key.
Renders chat messages and provides text-to-speech controls for assistant responses.
frontend/src/components/Chat/VoiceContro: Microphone control component using speech-to-text, handling start/stop recording and transcript callbacks.
frontend/src/components/Layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation, user menu, and logout logic tied to Internet Identity and profile state.
frontend/src/components/Settings/DeleteM: Card allowing users to permanently delete all stored data with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hook fetching the current user's profile using the backend actor with proper loading state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching chat history, adding messages, saving user profiles, and clearing user data via an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements a speech-to-text hook using browser SpeechRecognition with state for transcript, errors, and listening status.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Provides a text-to-speech hook using speechSynthesis with controls for speaking and stopping.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Adds React Query hooks to fetch the caller's user role and check admin status from the actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/chat/heuristics.ts: Generates deterministic heuristic chat responses in Hindi and English based on keyword categories.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Chat.tsx: Chat UI page that loads history, displays messages, sends user input through heuristic responses, and allows clearing chat data.
frontend/src/pages/FeaturePlan.tsx: Renders a detailed multi-phase feature roadmap with visual sections and status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero, privacy banner, and feature sections, including Internet Identity login actions.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacySafety.tsx: Displays detailed privacy and safety principles using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page showing user profile info and a delete-data component with loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking domain-validation features, issues, and new feature requests.
